oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Tennessee Governor Frank Clement and son Robert, 1955 January 19
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Governor Frank Clement and his oldest son Robert en route from the Tennessee State Capitol to a platform in front of the War Memorial Auditorium where he was administered the oath of office, becoming the first four-year-term Governor of Tennessee. Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Clement, Frank Goad--Inauguration, 1955; Clement, Robert N.; Clement family
